name: Blurp
description:
BLURP is a short puzzle platformer where you can draw your own terrain.

With the help of her pixie friend Blurp, help Lexi find her way home. Avoid traps, slippery slopes, fireballs and draw your own path to proceed to the next level!

Controls:

WASD keys to move and mouse to draw line

DISCLAIMER:

This is a prototype of my project in my Software Engineering class and is no longer in development. I am aware of the bugs, but since I lost the source code, I can no longer fix them. But the game should still be very playable. ENJOY!
